home.title: Hello! I am
home.desc: An IT student focusing on DevOps, looking for an internship to learn Linux, CI/CD, containerization and system deployment to grow into a professional DevOps Engineer.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: "The journey of learning and growing in DevOps"
about.p1: I am an Information Technology student passionate about building modern infrastructure and automating software delivery. I have built personal projects such as a DevOps system for a 3-layer IoT model (Device – Edge – Cloud) and an internal livestream virtualization stack.
about.p2: While still on my learning path, I proactively explore new technologies from containerization and CI/CD to cloud computing, aiming to create systems that are stable, secure, and scalable.
about.timeline1Desc: Automate build, update, and monitoring for ESP32 and Raspberry Pi, integrate containerization and centralized monitoring.
about.timeline2Desc: Deploy OpenNebula and RTMP streaming on internal network, test resource distribution capability and high availability.

about.v1Desc: Reduce manual operations, improve delivery efficiency
about.v2Desc: Build stable systems that are observable and recoverable
about.v3Desc: Continuously improve skills and explore new tech
about.v4Desc: Work effectively in teams, coordinate closely across functions
